name: Doodle Fit Lite
description:
✪ Now optimized for iPhone 5 and new iPad! ✪
✪ Includes exclusive levels, only available in this version! ✪

"It’s easy to toss out the word "addictive" in reviews of puzzle games, but this one really is." - AppleGazette

GAME DESCRIPTION

Your task is simple: fit the given set of blocks into given shapes. Drag the blocks inside and outside in search for the layout that covers the whole shape. A level is complete when all blocks have been used and there's no more free space in the shape.

DOODLE FIT LITE GUARANTEE

Once you start playing you won't be able to stop!

KEY FEATURES

➮ Absolute addictive game play – everyone playing this game will confirm: it's one of the most addictive puzzle games on the App Store

➮ Unique level shapes – Over 80 levels with different unique shapes and over 150 solutions in total for replayability.

➮ Doodle Graphics – Nice looking doodle-style graphics with two themes: notebook and chalkboard.

➮ Runs on all devices – Doodle Fit Lite is an universal application. You can use it on all your devices.

➮ Graphics Tailored to each device – With graphics optimized for every device you will always get the sharpest visual experience possible, no matter on which device you play.

➮ Controls Tailored to each device – You can not only drag your blocks into the shape, but also simply "draw" them!
